remarks: A weak universe is closed under functions with known domain and codomain.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
wun0.1 $e |- ( ph -> U e. WUni ) $.
wunop.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. U ) $.
wunop.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. U ) $.
wunf.3 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
wunf $p |- ( ph -> F e. U ) $.
